Class CryptUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain utilities for password encryption.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Detail

      • encryptPassword

        public static java.lang.String encryptPassword(java.lang.String password,
                               java.lang.String salt)
        Generates a SHA-1 hash of password and salt and returns it as hex-encoded string.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to encrypt
        salt - random string that should be used to salt the password
        Returns:
        hex-encoded string of hash

      • generateSalt

        public static java.lang.String generateSalt()
        Generates a random 160-bit-value and returns it as hex-encoded string.
        Returns:
        160 bit hex encoded random
